--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Hook gasped as he grabbed his shoulder wound. He noticed Longhaul
> panicking, and it would not help them. "Longhaul." he shouted. "Get 
me
> some emergency power." he yelled in a voice suggesting Longhaul 
should
> have been smart enough to already do it, in Hook's general snobish 
tone.

::LONG HAUL::

    (On the ship, back in time)
    Long Haul gave Hook a disgusted glare and stopped short of giving 
the other Decepticon the Cybertronian 'finger' sign. It took him a 
second, but he managed to find the strength...and the necessary 
work...to launch the emergency power.
    When it finally did flick on, he gave a triumphant hoot.
    "We have contact!!" he hollard, happy that the work gave him 
something besides his fear to focus on.

    (At present)
    Long Haul stood outside the ship and awaited his porders after 
role call. When it was done and Havotron gave him his orders, Long 
Haul quietly went to help load the wounded into the CR. His handling 
was none too light and his mannner was grim, but he did his work 
without a complaint.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
